archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1045
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want to be able to transfer payments simply with a 'button' between a DX customer account and a legacy account so that any misapplied payment can be applied to the correct account

properties.value: Unmatched payments will be added to suspence list. Would like to make that operation on matched payments? Yes, it can be also a case. Manual detection. Ability to mark the payment for transfer to other system.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
